short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A feature-rich virtual dice roller extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Experience the ultimate dice rolling tool with Advanced Dice Roller! Whether you're a tabletop gamer, decision-maker, or simply in need of a random number generator, this extension has you covered. Say goodbye to manual dice rolling and hello to effortless randomness!

Key Features:

Standard and Custom Dice: Choose from standard dice like D6, D20, or roll custom dice with any number of sides to suit your needs.
Sleek Interface: Enjoy a minimalistic and user-friendly interface. Roll dice with ease and style.
History Tracking: Keep track of your previous rolls with a convenient history feature. Never lose sight of your past rolls, whether for record-keeping or analysis.
Clear and Reset: Easily clear your roll history or reset settings with the click of a button. Stay organized and focused on the task at hand.
How It Works:
Simply select your desired dice type, click the "Roll" button, and watch as the results appear instantly. With Advanced Dice Roller, rolling dice has never been smoother or more efficient. Customize your dice settings, review your roll history, and enjoy seamless randomness at your fingertips.

Benefits:

Enhance your tabletop gaming experience with accurate and reliable dice rolls.
Simplify decision-making processes with quick and effortless random number generation.
Stay organized and focused with the ability to track and review roll history at any time.
Call to Action:
Install Advanced Dice Roller today and elevate your dice rolling experience to new heights! Whether you're a seasoned gamer or casual user, this extension is your go-to tool for all things randomness.

Support and Feedback:
We're here to support you every step of the way. If you have any questions, feedback, or suggestions, please don't hesitate to reach out to us at [eliz@faitness.io]. Your input is invaluable as we strive to improve and enhance the Advanced Dice Roller experience.
